seo.title: Get a Quote
seo.description: Share a few details and upload photos of the area — we’ll review everything and get back to you with next steps.

header.heading: Get Your Quote
header.description: Share a few details and upload photos of the area — we’ll review everything and get back to you with next steps.

expect.title: What to expect
expect.description: Here’s what typically happens after you submit your request.
steps: We review your details and photos.
We may contact you with a couple of quick questions.
We send an estimated range and a suggested timeline.
If needed, we schedule a short site visit.
You approve the quote and we book the job.

calculatorSummary.title: Pricing calculator estimate
calculatorSummary.note: Rough guide only — final pricing depends on photos, access, and exact scope.

form.title: Quote request
form.description: The more detail you provide, the more accurate your estimate will be.
form.photosHelp: Add clear photos of the area from a few angles.
form.maxPhotosError: You can upload up to 6 photos.
form.jobDetailsPlaceholder: What would you like done? Include approximate sizes, access notes, and anything else that helps us quote accurately.
form.toastSuccess: Quote request received! We'll be in touch soon.
